channel.title: Easy fix Rep++
channel.description: Hey guys, whenever you enter the fight pits, there is no "Attack" option whenever you right click them, does anybody know how to add that in? I know it's in client.java I just don't know how to add it, thanks!

item.title: Easy fix Rep++
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

that should be in your process

item.title: Easy fix Rep++
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Well I have this, is this the right thing?

getPA().multiWay(-1); HighAndLow();} getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); } else if (inCwGame || inPits) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); } else if (getPA().inPitsWait()) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Loading...", 1); }else if (!inCwWait) { getPA().sendFrame99(0); getPA().walkableInterface(-1); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Loading...", 1); } else if (inPits) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); } else if (getPA().inPitsWait()) { getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null", 1); }

item.title: Easy fix Rep++

item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

add it into the isInWilderness boolean,
in type 1
